name: La porte Hotel
description:
La Porte Hotel is a Horrific Platformer and Puzzle Game. Keep Going through an hotel hallway but be fast ! The monster is right behind you.

Explanations :

The objects only move when you move (forward/left/right in a way and backwards in the other way

When you face a wall with multiple door, you have to get the right one

(Tip : it's always the n°239)

A game made in 48h in the 13th Game Jam At LISAA (Parisian Video Game School) by 6 persons.
